name: Parsnip Seeds
description: Plant these in spring to grow a humble parsnip. Quick to harvest!

name: Cauliflower Seeds
description: Plant these in spring for a large, valuable cauliflower.

name: Potato Seeds
description: Plant these in spring to grow versatile potatoes.

name: Wheat Seeds
description: Plant these in spring or fall to grow wheat, a staple grain.

description: Plant these in spring or fall to grow wheat, a staple grain.

name: Blueberry Seeds
description: Plant these in summer to grow sweet blueberries that keep producing.

name: Tomato Seeds
description: Plant these in summer for juicy tomatoes that regrow.

name: Hot Pepper Seeds
description: Plant these in summer for spicy hot peppers that regrow quickly.

name: Melon Seeds
description: Plant these in summer to grow large, refreshing melons.

name: Cranberry Seeds
description: Plant these in fall for tart cranberries that yield multiple berries.

name: Pumpkin Seeds
description: Plant these in fall for a large, valuable pumpkin.

name: Grape Seeds
description: Plant these in fall to grow sweet grapes that produce in bunches.
